title: Shoki Tanpenshuu
original_name: あさぎり夕ー初期短編集ー
sinopse:
A collection of Yuu Asagiri's early works.

Hikari Mezashite Tondeike (Fly Reaching the Light)
Akai Fuusen ni Sayounara (Goodbye Red Balloon)
Salamander
Kane yo! Midori Nasu Daichi ni (Bells in a Green Meadow)
Shiroi Kage no Lina (Lina's White Shadow)
Tooi Yume no Naka he… (Far into the Dream...)
